TopicTitle: Looking for a mod to add planets.

Articles.Content: I've been looking through the mod database for a bit but haven't seen one. I'm looking for a mod that adds either more planets or another star with planets. I thought I saw Scott Manley have an entire solar system way way out in the distance in one of his videos. I don't really need the extra parts to get there. (well I may but I wanna try to get there using stock first).

KopernicusTech is the only one that I think is still active:

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/109122-WIP-KopernicusTech-An-integration-attempt-between-Kopernicus-and-KittopiaTech-%280-121-02-13-15%29/page70](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/109122-WIP-KopernicusTech-An-integration-attempt-between-Kopernicus-and-KittopiaTech-%280-121-02-13-15%29/page70)

Otherwise, there's Planet Factory, which is the original planet creation mod (I'm pretty sure it still works).
For that link you provided. Is that a planet generator? Looks pretty cool. Does it allow you to make another star?

> 
> For that link you provided. Is that a planet generator? Looks pretty cool. Does it allow you to make another star?

Yeah, it allows you to create new planets. It's really a work in progress, but you can use it to make planets. I don't know if they got stars working yet, though.

Also, there's some activity in the [Kopernicus](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/88168-Early-development-0-24-Kopernicus-Planetary-System-Modifier) thread. Kopernicus was the second big planet-creation attempt, but it's pretty much died off until recently.

There's also [Starsystems](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/99353-0-25-StarSystems-v0-2-%28Nov-6%29-Under-New-Managment?p=1526154#post1526154), which allows star creation and planetary system modification (though not planet creation). However, it hasn't been updated in a while.

EDIT: Yeah, I think KopernicusTech does allow star creation.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-15T17:12:39Z" title="03/15/2015 05:12  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 15, 2015</time> by Vaporo**
I second Vaporo's movement. KopernicusTech is a lot of fun to mess around with once you get the gist of it. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Modding question moved to the modding sub-forum.
